name: Potato Salad
keywords: cooked potatoes, dijon mustard, dill, eggs, mayonnaise, parsley, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 hard-boiled eggs, shelled, whites and yolks carefully separated
6 large waxy potatoes (about 2i pounds), boiled, cooled, peeled and cut into large bite-size chunks

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, smash the yolks with a fork. Add the mustard and combine well. Dissolve the sugar in the warm water, add to the yolks and whisk to combine. Add the mayonnaise and stir well. Add the parsley, dill and scallions and stir well.
Coarsely chop the whites and toss with the potatoes. Add to the dressing, toss well and serve.
